category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA123_relation_navigation_rel_types_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to override the default mode of relation expansion for specific TCAA relationship types. Possible values (multiple values): each value corresponds to the name of a TCAA relation type followed by the required specific expansion mode. For example, if the preference contains the following entry: ACD2_TCAA84_ref_link_rel=1 then the relations for attached reference links will be expanded applying the current revision rule, regardless the default mode specified in the preference TCAA123_relation_navigation_default_mode.
